File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary; acknowledgements; and contact information.
File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE FLMD v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Data dictionary that defines column and row headers across all tabular data files (files ending in ".csv" or ".tsv") in the data package.

Definitions of methods codes used in sample data files. The file follows the Environmental System Science Data Infrastructure for a Virtual Ecosystem (ESS-DIVE) Reporting Format for Soil; Sediment; and Water Chemistry data (Boye et al. 2022).
Standard: ESS-DIVE CSV v1; ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1

File_Description: Metadata for each set of samples collected at a given point in space and time. Each row refers to a sample that was collected and includes registered International Generic Sample Numbers (IGSNs). The metadata file provides accompanying information captured in the field (i.e. date; coordinates; location description; etc.). Includes metadata required by Environmental System Science Data Infrastructure for a Virtual Ecosystem (ESS-DIVE) Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020); there is no separate file associated with the ESS-DIVE Location Metadata Reporting Format.
Standard: ESS-DIVE CSV v1; ESS-DIVE Sample v1

File_Description: Benzene polycarboxylic acids (BPCA) data from leachate samples. Includes benzenepentacarboxylic acid (B5CA) and benzenehexacarobyxlic acid (B6CA).  Methods information is embedded with method codes that are defined in MCSN_Methods_Codes.csv.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Soil; Sediment; and Water Chemistry (Boye et al. 2022)

File_Description: R script to process FTICR data.
Instructions for working with 12T FTICR-MS data.
Calibration file needed to process FTICR-MS data.
Raw 12T FTICR-MS instrument files associated with samples. The asterisk * indicates the sample name. FTICR methods information can be found in MCSN_Methods_Codes.csv
